title: Where are my photos and video clips saved? Can I change the path?
answer:
When a microSD card is available, photos and videos are saved on the microSD card.
>To set the default saving location, touch  > Preferred save location > Memory card/Phone.

 

See the following table for reference.

 



>To view photos or video clips:
. If the photos or video clips are saved in the phone memory, touch File Manager > Local files > Internal > DCIM > Camera.
. If the photos or video clips are saved in the microSD card, touch File Manager > Local files > SD card > DCIM > Camera.
